name: Only One Room (dedilol)
description:
This Game is part of 2019 - GMT Game Jam. Its a plataform and puzzle game, whith many "only one" mechanics, it is also made with only one color, and have a interesting spear mechanic. 

   You have to press A,W,S,D to move, Space to jump, and Ctrl or Mouse1 to throw a spear, You win when reach the diamond. If You get stucked press ESC to kill yourself with honor!!

  This game consist in a sequence of 8 levels in the same room, each one with a twist. 

  Hope You have fun and get frustrated!!
